alert.note: Alert for Custer (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 23 at 11:50AM MDT until further notice by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Idaho... Big Lost River at Howell Ranch near Chilly affecting Custer County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pocatello. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Lost River at Howell Ranch near Chilly. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 4.1 feet, Widespread lowland flooding from Howell Ranch downriver to the top of Mackay Reservoir. Fish Hatchery Road near Donahue Ranch may have water flowing over it. Canals and headgates may have problems. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday the stage was 4.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday was 4.1 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 4.2 feet early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 4.1 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 4.2 feet on 07/03/1998. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Big Lost River Howell Ranch near Chill 4.1 4.1 Tue 11 am MD 3.9 3.8 3.9 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive through flooded areas.
